title: Content-Based Self-Directed Learning Course for Strengthening Disaster Management Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Disaster Management Theory and Field Experience
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance language literacy and content utilization competencies for elementary school teachers in disaster response scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can search for appropriate content on DMLH with 80% accuracy using disaster management-related keywords
Learners can build a customized disaster management content dashboard using the "bookmark" feature
Learners produce and submit a disaster response scenario project based on content collected via the "binder" feature

resources: DMLH (Digital Media Learning Hub) platform access rights

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
